title: The Adventures of Mary-Kate & Ashley
brief_description: Mystery, action and songs abound as Detectives Mary-Kate and Ashley undertake a set of daring advetures. These trenchcoat twins and their dog Clue live by their agency motto to “solve any crime by dinner time.”
